title: How easily do you get permaban?
body:
So i got instantly 14 day ban (didn't say much but it was toxic) from one game and i was wondering how easily do you get permabanned after the 14 day ban.
Is it possible that riot sort of removes the 14 day ban from my records in the future if there haven't been anything problems?

replies.body:
You can be punished again in as little as 1 game.

You drop punishment tiers by playing games. On average, it takes 3 months of playing to drop a punishment tier. If you play alot of games, it will drop in less calendar days.
Don't be toxic and you wouldn't need to worry when your next ban is.

> Is it possible that riot sort of removes the 14 day ban from my records in the future if there haven't been anything problems?

I don't know all the details, but I believe Yes you could work it off so to say.  I don't have any ideal how many games, and it is games not time.

I would like to caution you to be Very careful in future games, I believe once you have been punished it takes less to get to the perma-banned terr.

Take it easy, have care of what you choice to say in chat. GL
when the 14day ends you are at the very edge of being perma'd so, it won't take much at all.
Don't chat at all....that's how easy it is.
